form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Brown (for himself and Mr. Tillis) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program to cover recipients of the Marine Gunnery Sergeant John David Fry scholarship, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fry Scholarship Enhancement Act of 2015.

section.header: Expansion of Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program

subsection.text: Section 3317(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking in paragraphs (1) and (2) and inserting in paragraphs (1), (2), and (9).
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to academic years beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act.
